long_description: The Nite Ize Connect case keeps the features of your iPhone 5 accessible while providing dependable shock absorption and practical protection from everyday wear and tear. Top of the case easily opens and snaps securely closed with an innovative flex-hinge design. Rugged Lexan(R) polycarbonate material helps shield your iPhone 5 from scratches and absorbs shock from bangs and bumps. Comes with a removable carry clip that lets you attach your phone to a pocket, strap or belt; it also includes a clear, anti-fingerprint screen protector. Combine the Connect case with the Connect mobile mount or Connect cradle (both sold separately) to create convenient platforms for dashboards, handlebars and desktops. The Nite Ize Connect case features a soft-touch feel and a diamond grip pattern.
short_description: The Nite Ize Connect case keeps the features of your iPhone 5 accessible while providing dependable shock absorption and practical protection from everyday wear and tear.
